## Changing the column names

```{r}
rawdons_aug <- rawdons|>
  mutate(Year = str_match(Date, pattern =r"(\d+)"), .keep="unused")
rawdons_aug <- rawdons_aug |> 
  mutate(DONs = ID,.keep="unused")


```
